helpText:
📃 List of available commands (7 in 2 categories):

🛠 General: help, about
🎉 Fun: hello, joke, dice, coinflip, 8ball
aboutText:
ℹ About this bot:
    🤖 General purpose bot, inspired by AmbientBot.
    👱‍♂️ Created by DDev
helloReply1: 👋 Hello ${user}, this is LunaFrost. To view my list of commands type '${prefix}help'.
helloReply3: 👋 Welcome ${user}, this is LunaFrost. To view my list of commands type '${prefix}help'.
diceRoll: 🎲 You rolled a ${result} on a ${sides}-sided dice!
